name: Loco The Firefox HD v1.0R
description:
Explore the magic island as our adventurous red panda: Loco the firefox.

Blast through the sky with our crazy hero from barrel to barrel, through wind and snow in this mad barrel blast adventure.

On your quest to find the golden acorns you will encounter many challenges and hidden secrets as you venture further across the extraordinary magical island.

*Over 40 increasingly challenging levels in 6 unique stages.

*Specifically designed for comfortable gameplay on mobile devices.

*Beautiful HD graphics.
